summary: Use this API to fetch the details of order income by batch
description: Use this API to fetch the details of order income by batch.

query.name: order_sn_list
query.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order. limit [1,50] The number of recommended requests ranges from 1 to 20 orders.

schema.name: escrow_detail
schema.description: The escrow detail for one order

schema.name: order_sn
schema.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order. <path></path>

schema.name: buyer_user_name
schema.description: The username of buyer. <path></path>

schema.name: return_order_sn_list
schema.description: The list of the serial number of return. <path></path>

schema.name: escrow_amount
schema.description: The total amount that the seller is expected to receive for the order and will change before order is completed. For non cb sip affiliate shop (new formula): escrow_amount= original_cost_of_goods_sold-original_shopee_discount+seller_return_refund+ shopee_discounts- voucher_from_seller- seller_coin_cash_back+ buyer_paid_shipping_fee- actual_shipping_fee+ shopee_shipping_rebate+ shipping_fee_discount_from_3pl- reverse_shipping_fee+ rsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount+ fsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount- final_return_to_seller_shipping_fee- seller_transaction_fee- service_fee- commission_fee- campaign_fee- shipping_seller_protection_fee_premium_amount- delivery_seller_protection_fee_premium_amount-final_escrow_product_gst- order_ams_commission fee- escrow_tax-sales_tax_on_lvg-reverse_shipping_fee_sst-shipping_fee_sst-withholding_tax-overseas_return_service_fee-vat_on_imported_goods For cb sip affiliate shop: escrow_amount=escrow_amount_pri * exchange_rate note: Return refund amount = if adjustable RR, will equal to drc_adjustable_refund

schema.name: order_original_price
schema.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.

schema.name: original_price
schema.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.

schema.name: order_selling_price
schema.description: This field value = sum of item unit price.selling price comes from the sum up of each item's unit price. For non-bundle deal case, this value will be same like order_original_price; For bundle deal case, this value will be price of sum of item price before bundle deal promo but after item promo.It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: order_seller_discount
schema.description: The total discount seller provided for this order. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: seller_discount
schema.description: Final sum of each item seller discount of a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: order_discounted_price
schema.description: The total discounted price for this order. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: shopee_discount
schema.description: Final sum of each item Shopee discount of a specific order. This amount will rebate to seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate order. )

schema.name: voucher_from_seller
schema.description: Final value of voucher provided by Seller for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: voucher_from_shopee
schema.description: Final value of voucher provided by Shopee for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: coins
schema.description: This value indicates the total amount offset when the buyer consumed Shopee Coins upon checkout. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: cross_border_tax
schema.description: Amount incurred by Buyer for purchasing items outside of home country. Amount may change after Return Refund. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: payment_promotion
schema.description: The amount offset via payment promotion. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: commission_fee
schema.description: The commission fee charged by Shopee platform if applicable. For CB SIP affiliate shop: commission_fee=commission_fee_pri * exchange_rate

schema.name: service_fee
schema.description: Amount charged by Shopee to seller for additional services. For CB SIP affiliate shop: service_fee=service_fee_pri * exchange_rate

schema.name: seller_transaction_fee
schema.description: Tansaction fee paid by seller for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: seller_lost_compensation
schema.description: Compensation to seller in case of lost parcel. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: seller_coin_cash_back
schema.description: Value of coins provided by Seller for purchasing with his or her store for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: escrow_tax
schema.description: Cross-border tax imposed by the Indonesian government on sellers. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: final_shipping_fee
schema.description: Final adjusted amount that seller has to bear as part of escrow. This amount could be negative or positive. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: actual_shipping_fee
schema.description: The final shipping cost of order and it is positive. For Non-integrated logistics channel is 0. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: shopee_shipping_rebate
schema.description: The platform shipping subsidy to the seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: shipping_fee_sst
schema.description: The Service Tax charged on Seller Paid Shipping Fee for forward shipping, based on Malaysia SST regulations for shipping fees on all orders. Definition of Seller Paid Shipping Fee is Actual Shipping Fee subtracted by sum of Shipping Fee Paid by Buyer and Shipping Rebate From Shopee. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

schema.name: shipping_fee_discount_from_pl
schema.description: The discount of shipping fee from 3PL. Currently only applicable to ID. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: seller_shipping_discount
schema.description: The shipping discount defined by seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: estimated_shipping_fee
schema.description: The estimated shipping fee is an estimation calculated by Shopee based on specific logistics courier's standard. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: seller_voucher_code
schema.description: The list of voucher code provided by seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: drc_adjustable_refund
schema.description: The adjustable refund amount from Shopee Dispute Resolution Center.

schema.name: refund_amount_to_buyer
schema.description: Amount returned to Seller in the event of Partial Return.

schema.name: cost_of_goods_sold
schema.description: Final amount paid by the buyer for the items in a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: original_cost_of_goods_sold
schema.description: Amount paid by the buyer for the items in a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: original_shopee_discount
schema.description: Sum of each item Shopee discount of a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: items
schema.description: This object contains the detailed breakdown for all the items in this order, including regular items(non-activity) and activity items.

schema.name: item_id
schema.description: ID of item

schema.name: item_name
schema.description: Name of item

schema.name: item_sku
schema.description: A item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.

schema.name: model_id
schema.description: ID of the model that belongs to the same item.

schema.name: model_name
schema.description: Name of the model that belongs to the same item. A seller can offer variations of the same item. For example, the seller could create a fixed-priced listing for a t-shirt design and offer the shirt in different colors and sizes. In this case, each color and size combination is a separate variation. Each variation can have a different quantity and price.

schema.name: model_sku
schema.description: A model SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller. It is only intended for the seller's use. Many sellers assign a SKU to an item of a specific type, size, and color, which are variations of one item in Shopee Listings.

schema.name: original_price
schema.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.

schema.name: original_price_pri
schema.description: The agreed settlement price of items used as settlement basis, amount is in the primary currency. (Only display for CB SIP affiliate shop.)

schema.name: selling_price
schema.description: For non-bundle deal case, this value will be same like item original_price; For bundle deal case, this value will be price of sum of item price before bundle deal promo but after item promo. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1 (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop.)

schema.name: discounted_price
schema.description: The after-discount price of the item in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. If there is no discount, this value will be the same as that of original_price.

schema.name: seller_discount
schema.description: The discount provided by seller for this item

schema.name: shopee_discount
schema.description: The discount provided by Shopee for this item

schema.name: discount_from_coin
schema.description: The offset of this item when the buyer consumed Shopee Coins upon checkout. In case of bundle deal item, this value will return 0. Due to technical restriction, this field will return incorrect value under bundle deal case if we don’t configure it to 0.

schema.name: discount_from_voucher_shopee
schema.description: The offset of this item when the buyer use Shopee voucher.

schema.name: discount_from_voucher_seller
schema.description: The offset of this item when the buyer use seller-specific voucher.

schema.name: activity_type
schema.description: The type of the item, default is "". If the item is a bundle item the value is "bundle_deal", and if a add on deal item, the value is "add_on_deal"

schema.name: activity_id
schema.description: If bundle_deal the is id of bundle deal, if add_on_deal this is id of add on deal.

schema.name: is_main_item
schema.description: Meaning a main or sub item for add_on_deal.

schema.name: quantity_purchased
schema.description: This value indicates the number of identical items purchased at the same time by the same buyer from one listing/item.

schema.name: is_b2c_shop_item
schema.description: Indicates whether this is a B2C owned item.

schema.name: ams_commission_fee
schema.description: The amount of affiliate commission fee. Applicable for items sold via the Affiliate Program.

schema.name: escrow_amount_pri
schema.description: The total amount in the prim currency that the seller is expected to receive for the order and will change before order completed . escrow_amount_pri=original_price_pri-seller_return_refund_pri-commission_fee_pri-service_fee_pri-drc_adjustable_refund_pri.(Only display for cb sip affiliate order. )

schema.name: buyer_total_amount_pri
schema.description: The total amount that paid by buyer in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate order. )

schema.name: original_price_pri
schema.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the primary currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.(Only display for cb sip affiliate order. ) <path></path>

schema.name: seller_return_refund_pri
schema.description: Amount returned to Seller in the event of Partial Return in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: commission_fee_pri
schema.description: The commission fee charged by Shopee platform if applicable in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: service_fee_pri
schema.description: Amount charged by Shopee to seller for additional services in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: drc_adjustable_refund_pri
schema.description: The adjustable refund amount from Shopee Dispute Resolution Center in the primary currency after proration. (Only applicable for cb sip affiliate shop.)

schema.name: pri_currency
schema.description: The currency of the country or region where the shop that real seller operates. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: aff_currency
schema.description: The currency of the country or region where shop opened in. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: exchange_rate
schema.description: Exchange rate from primary shop currency to affiliate shop currency.

schema.name: reverse_shipping_fee
schema.description: Shopee charges the reverse shipping fee for the returned order.The value of this field will be non-negative.

schema.name: reverse_shipping_fee_sst
schema.description: The Service Tax charged on Reverse Shipping Fee for reverse shipping, based on Malaysia SST regulations for shipping fees on all orders. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

schema.name: final_product_protection
schema.description: The total amount of product protection purchased during placing an order.

schema.name: credit_card_promotion
schema.description: This value indicate the offset via credit card promotion.

schema.name: credit_card_transaction_fee
schema.description: This value indicate the total transaction fee. credit_card_transaction_fee=buyer_transaction_fee+seller_transaction_fee

schema.name: final_product_vat_tax
schema.description: Value-added Tax is required for online purchases based on EU Value-added Tax regulations . (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: final_shipping_vat_tax
schema.description: Value-added Tax for product price is required for online purchases based on EU Value-added Tax regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

schema.name: campaign_fee
schema.description: The campaign fee charged by Shopee platform. Only available for some local Indonesian shops.

schema.name: sip_subsidy
schema.description: The SIP subsidy amount is the difference between the item settlement price set by seller and item price actually paid by buyer. (Only available for CB SIP A Shops)

schema.name: sip_subsidy_pri
schema.description: The SIP subsidy amount is the difference between the item settlement price set by seller and item price actually paid by buyer. This value is in the primary currency. (Only available for CB SIP A Shops)

schema.name: rsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount
schema.description: The insurance claim amount if seller opt in to insurance program. this covers Reverse shipping Fee in the case of RR. As per Jun 2024: - For ID & MY Local: After Extension on coverage to FSF due to RR. this claim amount will consist of FSF + RSF claim. - For PH local: This will only cover RSF claim will be updated if there's any RR/cancellation

schema.name: rsf_seller_protection_fee_premium_amount
schema.description: Amount charged by Shopee to seller for additional services. Only apply for PH local orders.

schema.name: final_escrow_product_gst
schema.description: Goods and Service Tax for product price is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Singapore GST regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop selling in Singapore)

schema.name: final_escrow_shipping_gst
schema.description: Goods and Service Tax for shipping fee is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Singapore GST regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop selling in Singapore.)

schema.name: delivery_seller_protection_fee_premium_amount
schema.description: [Currently apply to ID & local orders only] An insurance premium charged to seller at the time parcel is picked up by 3PL for insurance in case of parcel lost/damaged by 3PL.

schema.name: order_ams_commission_fee
schema.description: The amount of affiliate commission fee for this order. Applicable for orders sold via the Affiliate Program.

schema.name: buyer_payment_method
schema.description: The payment method buyer used when do the order checkout.

schema.name: instalment_plan
schema.description: The instalment plan buyer chosen when do the order checkout. Only applicable when payment method support instalment.

schema.name: sales_tax_on_lvg
schema.description: Sales Tax on Low Value Goods (LVG) is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Malaysia SST regulations for selective orders (e.g. CB LVG orders in MY)

schema.name: withholding_tax
schema.description: Only for PH local shops. According to regulations issued by Bureau of Internal Revenue in PH, the Withholding Tax is applied to the gross remittances sent by Shopee to online suppliers of goods and services.

schema.name: overseas_return_service_fee
schema.description: This is overseas return service fee charged to sellers who register ORS program.(Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

schema.name: prorated_coins_value_offset_return_items
schema.description: This is the prorated value from cash equivalent of coin offset due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

schema.name: prorated_shopee_voucher_offset_return_items
schema.description: This is the prorated refund value from shopee voucher discount due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

schema.name: prorated_seller_voucher_offset_return_items
schema.description: This is the prorated refund value from seller voucher discount due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

schema.name: prorated_payment_channel_promo_bank_offset_return_items
schema.description: This is the prorated value from bank payment channel promo due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR.If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

schema.name: prorated_payment_channel_promo_shopee_offset_return_items
schema.description: This is the prorated value from shopee payment channel promo due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR.If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

schema.name: fsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount
schema.description: The claim amount given to seller if seller opt in to shipping fee service program. this covers Forward Shipping Fee cost in the case of cancelled due to Failed delivery. only apply to PH Local as per Jun 2024.

schema.name: shipping_seller_protection_fee_amount
schema.description: Service fee charged to seller in MY,ID,PH Local (as per Jun 2024) due to additional program purchased

schema.name: final_return_to_seller_shipping_fee
schema.description: The amount of fee charged to seller (if any) for the failed delivery order

schema.name: vat_on_imported_goods
schema.description: 7% VAT is charged for imported goods entering Thailand

schema.name: buyer_payment_info
schema.description: The buyer payment info at order checkout moment. (snapshot value)

schema.name: buyer_payment_method
schema.description: The payment method used by buyer.

schema.name: buyer_service_fee
schema.description: An additional service fee charged by shopee to Buyer at checkout. currently only applicable to ID region. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

schema.name: buyer_tax_amount
schema.description: The tax amount paid by buyer. currently this is a custom tax charged to CB orders in TW,CL,MX

schema.name: buyer_total_amount
schema.description: The total amount paid by buyer at checkout moment.

schema.name: credit_card_promotion
schema.description: The promotion provided by credit card. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

schema.name: icms_tax_amount
schema.description: The icms tax paid by buyer. this is only applicable to BR region. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

schema.name: import_tax_amount
schema.description: The import tax paid by buyer. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

schema.name: initial_buyer_txn_fee
schema.description: Transaction fee paid by buyer for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. ). Most regions would have this fee charged to buyer at checkout depending on the fee rules applied in each region. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

schema.name: insurance_premium
schema.description: The insurance premium paid by buyer. Currently only applicable to some regions like ID & BR it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

schema.name: iof_tax_amount
schema.description: The iof tax paid by buyer. this is only applicable for BR region. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

schema.name: is_paid_by_credit_card
schema.description: Whether this order is paid by credit card. it's related to payment channel used at checkout

schema.name: merchant_subtotal
schema.description: The total item price paid by buyer at checkout. it is an initial value and will not be updated after RR/cancellation

schema.name: seller_voucher
schema.description: The voucher provided by seller to offset some value needs to be paid by buyer. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

schema.name: shipping_fee
schema.description: The shipping fee paid by buyer. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

schema.name: shipping_fee_sst_amount
schema.description: The shipping fee sst paid by buyer. Currently apply to MY region only it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

schema.name: shopee_voucher
schema.description: The voucher provided by Shopee to offset the amount need to be paid by buyer. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

schema.name: shopee_coins_redeemed
schema.description: This is an amount of coin used by buyer at checkout to offset some amount to be paid. it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Error code

schema.name: message
schema.description: Error message
